mapper.insert: insert into message(message_id, chatting_id, to_id, from_id, chat_content, timestamp, CHAT_READ_CHECK) values(message_seq.nextval, #{chatting_id}, #{to_id}, #{from_id}, #{chat_content}, sysdate, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM message WHERE message_id IN (SELECT MAX(message_id) FROM message WHERE from_id = #{to_id} or to_id= #{from_id} GROUP BY to_id, from_id)
